title: ArtyTorrent Pack 95-Loop Noir Paranormal Sound Design-WAV CD
description:
ArtyTorrent Pack 95-Loop Noir Paranormal Sound Design-WAV CD
------------------------------------------------------------

Something rather esoteric in this pack. "Loop Noir" is a CD of acidized WAV samples unlike anything else I&#039;ve posted.
This full CD-rip (provided by Dynamics) contains a range of spooky soundscapes grouped into 15 sessions.
The samples were evidently recorded in the supposedly haunted Bodmin Jail, and would be ideal to anyone creating the soundtrack to a ghostly horror movie. You&#039;ll probably only find this pack useful if you&#039;re into ambient, experimental, or industrial soundtracks.

Full details and Acid projects available at: http://www.sonycreativesoftware.com/loop_libraries/showloop.asp?SPID=442

CD Rip is in BIN/CUE format, so you need to mount it with PowerISO or burn it to CD-R.

262 loops. 607MB.

--
Arty - "Haunted dancefloor?"
28th February 2008.
